data.title: ריכזנו עבורכם משרות טריות מהלוח שלנו עם כל הפרטים הרלוונטים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטים עבורכם

paragraphs.context: We are looking for a talented Automation Developer to join our R&D Team, to take on a major role in the automation team. Our finest group of engineers is building extensive automation Infrastructure for both client side and server side component (using C# ). You will have an opportunity to shape the development paradigm, Infrastructure and capacity of our platform. Raise the quality of our product and provide scalability by creating new automation frameworks and tools.
